DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate walk model osteoarthritis use test new therapeutic agent . The primary hypothesis participant treat Naproxen Ultracet low Pain Intensity ( PI ) treat Placebo self-paced walk Day 3 treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect Analgesics Walking Model Knee Pain ( 0000-105 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Has osteoarthritis knee primary source pain knee Females must pregnant nursing must agree use birth control throughout study Is willing limit alcohol caffeine intake Is willing abstain smoke study visit Must able walk treadmill pace least 1 mile/hour Has medical/arthritic disease would interfere evaluation Is unable take naproxen Ultracet Has congestive heart failure angina Has history stroke Has history uncontrolled high blood pressure Has history cancer Regularly use walker cane
